title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday 9 September 2024 through Monday 16 September 2024🔗

There were no new BCD releases in this timeframe.

BCD Watch: A service of

Subscribe: RSS • Atom • JSON

The most recent known BCD release was v5.5.51 (Friday 6 September 2024)
items.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 16 2024
items.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday 2 September 2024 through Monday 9 September 2024🔗

Browser Support Changes: +4, -0

Support increases (4)

CSS

  1. css ➞ selectors ➞ active-view-transition
    Added to Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ commands ➞ CreateVirtualPressureSource
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver ➞ commands ➞ DeleteVirtualPressureSource
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. webdriver ➞ commands ➞ UpdateVirtualPressureSource
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 32

Show all 32 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occuring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (24)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Tuesday 27 August 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ PointerEvent ➞ altitudeAngle
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ PointerEvent ➞ azimuthAngle
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ PointerEvent ➞ getCoalescedEvents
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ PointerEvent ➞ getPredictedEvents
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ FileSystemFileHandle ➞ createSyncAccessHandle ➞ mode
    Backfilled from  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ FileSystemFileHandle ➞ createWritable ➞ mode
    Backfilled from  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ Notification ➞ requestPermission_static ➞ returns_promise
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ size ➞ jis-b4
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ at-rules ➞ page ➞ size ➞ jis-b5
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-align
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-align ➞ center
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-align ➞ space-around
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  6. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-align ➞ space-between
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  7. css ➞ properties ➞ ruby-align ➞ start
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  8. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-width
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  9. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-width ➞ auto
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  10. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-width ➞ none
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  11. css ➞ properties ➞ scrollbar-width ➞ thin
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  12. css ➞ properties ➞ view-transition-class
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  13. css ➞ properties ➞ view-transition-class ➞ none
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  14. css ➞ selectors ➞ active-view-transition-type
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  15. css ➞ selectors ➞ target-text
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ regular_expressions ➞ modifier
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Refresh
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

New entries (7)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Tuesday 27 August 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ FileSystemFileHandle ➞ createSyncAccessHandle ➞ mode
  2. api ➞ FileSystemFileHandle ➞ createWritable ➞ mode
  3. api ➞ Notification ➞ requestPermission_static ➞ returns_promise

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Refresh

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ commands ➞ CreateVirtualPressureSource
  2. webdriver ➞ commands ➞ DeleteVirtualPressureSource
  3. webdriver ➞ commands ➞ UpdateVirtualPressureSource

Removed entries (1)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Tuesday 27 August 2024, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

API

  1. api ➞ IDBFactory ➞ open ➞ options_parameter

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday 26 August 2024 through Monday 2 September 2024🔗

Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

New entries (6)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Saturday 24 August 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

Removed entries (1)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Saturday 24 August 2024, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

items.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Aug 26 2024
items.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday 12 August 2024 through Monday 19 August 2024🔗

Browser Support Changes: +10, -0

Support increases (10)

API

  1. api ➞ CSPViolationReportBody
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ HTMLDetailsElement ➞ name
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveBits ➞ x25519
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveKey ➞ x25519
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ exportKey ➞ x25519
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ generateKey ➞ x25519
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ importKey ➞ x25519
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Content-Security-Policy ➞ report-to
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. http ➞ headers ➞ Report-To (⚠️ deprecated)
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. http ➞ headers ➞ Reporting-Endpoints
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 35

Show all 35 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occuring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (27)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Wednesday 7 August 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody ➞ anticipatedRemoval
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody ➞ columnNumber
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody ➞ id
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody ➞ lineNumber
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody ➞ message
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ DeprecationReportBody ➞ sourceFile
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ HTMLVideoElement ➞ cancelVideoFrameCallback
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  9. api ➞ HTMLVideoElement ➞ requestVideoFrameCallback
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  10. api ➞ Report
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  11. api ➞ Report ➞ body
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  12. api ➞ Report ➞ toJSON
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  13. api ➞ Report ➞ type
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  14. api ➞ Report ➞ url
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  15. api ➞ ReportBody
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  16. api ➞ ReportBody ➞ toJSON
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  17. api ➞ ReportingObserver ➞ ReportingObserver
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  18. api ➞ ReportingObserver
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  19. api ➞ ReportingObserver ➞ disconnect
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  20. api ➞ ReportingObserver ➞ observe
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  21. api ➞ ReportingObserver ➞ takeRecords
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  22. api ➞ ReportingObserver ➞ worker_support
    Backfilled from  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  23. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ exportKey ➞ ed25519
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  24. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ generateKey ➞ ed25519
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  25. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ importKey ➞ ed25519
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  26. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ sign ➞ ed25519
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  27. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ verify ➞ ed25519
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

New entries (7)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Wednesday 7 August 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveBits ➞ x25519
  2. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ deriveKey ➞ x25519
  3. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ exportKey ➞ x25519
  4. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ generateKey ➞ x25519
  5. api ➞ SubtleCrypto ➞ importKey ➞ x25519

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Reporting-Endpoints

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ webRequest ➞ getSecurityInfo ➞ options

Removed entries (1)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Wednesday 7 August 2024, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ masonry-auto-flow
